short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The BEST extension for Amazon! Powerful and helpful tools to shop like a pro!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BEST will re-sort your Amazon searches by placing the products with the
         most reviews at the top of your search.

More options coming soon... in a future version. Stay tuned!
